item.title: Free Anti Lag Code
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

I am about to post a new anti lag code. Wait about 5 minutes, and don’t post until I add the anti lag code under this post![br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 07:17:24 PM[/size][hr]Ok the code is:

import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“Restarting <3Scape.”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 7000)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “Run.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 07:18:36 PM[/size][hr]Please reply if you have any suggestions. If you want to complain, do it somewhere else!
[center] Double posting/bumping, flogging code and making claims to it.[/center]

Read full topic
